alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 11:13PM AKST until November 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SUNDAY ALONG THE RICHARDSON HIGHWAY FROM THE EDGERTON HIGHWAY SOUTH TO NEAR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Copper River Basin, along the Richardson Highway from the Edgerton highway south to near Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow has developed across the southern Copper River Basin Saturday evening. Snow intensity will increase overnight with moderate snow continuing through early Sunday. Slightly warmer air will move in Sunday morning, possibly causing snow to mix with or change over to rain. McCarthy and the southeastern basin will change to rain while areas further north and west (including Glennallen) can expect 1 to 4 inches of snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
